section_title: ACCEPTANCE OF THE ACTIONS TAKEN AT WGI-12
sentences: The Republic of Korea opposed reference to the 'Sea of Japan' in the underlying assessment, noting that the issue is contested and that the IPCC language should remain neutral, while Japan said 'Sea of Japan' is a standard geographical term.
The Republic of Korea expressed his wish to resolve the issue before the IPCC-36 report.
IPCC Chair Pachauri assured that the remarks and concerns of the Republic of Korea and Japan have been recorded, noting that the issue goes beyond the Panel's competence.
The Panel then accepted the actions of WGI-12 with regard to the approval of the AR5 WGI SPM and the acceptance of its underlying scientific and technical assessment.
enb_long_title: Twelfth Session of Working Group I (WGI) of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) and Thirty-sixth Session of the IPCC
